reviews.text:
Really glad we gave this place a try! 

We each got an OG crunch with the chipotle steak, and guacamole on the side. On fridays you can buy one get one...
Everything tasted fresh and authentic. It's basically everything you wish the food was at taco bell. Good portion sizes and campus-friendly prices. This...
Service horrible, food was okay...upscale Taco Bell crunch wrap. Price was to high for the a crunchwrap and a bottle of water.  Very odd ordering if you go...
